code: import{CACHEUSER,UNCACHEUSER}from'../user_const';import storageUtils from'../../utils/storageUtils';var initUser=storageUtils.getUser();export default function countReducer(){var prevState=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initUser;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,data=action.data;switch(type){case CACHEUSER:console.log(data);storageUtils.saveUser(data);return data;case UNCACHEUSER:storageUtils.removeUser();return{};default:return prevState;}}
